alert.note: Alert for Choctaw (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 2:02PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Pushmataha and northeastern Choctaw Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 202 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated isolated strong thunderstorms from 4 miles northwest of Rattan to 5 miles north of Fort Towson. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Sawyer... Rattan... Hugo Lake State Park... Oleta... Cloudy... Corinne... Apple... Dela... Sobol... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
